description: Display an interactive photo wall of your audience on the stage screen

presentation.body:
What the moment does

The Mosaic Moment creates a massive mosaic picture with the selfies of your audience. You can also add branded images and photo filters to make the collage appear in your brand. A moderation page is available to ban inappropriate content.

How to use the Moment at your event

Use the Mosaic Moment to bridge waiting time before a show or to create fun interactions between acts.The Collage Moment is also a great way to onboard the audience to Stagecast - everyone likes to have a branded selfie with your filter!
